titleStmt.title: By His Highnes Councill in Scotland for the government thereof: a declaration, for putting in execution the laws in force against Jesuites, seminary-priests, and traficking-papists.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins in Hart-Close over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption title and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.
